TASK: Craft an item of type: mojang_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 17}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 29}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 18, "index": 37}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft mojang_banner_pattern, I need to place an enchanted_golden_apple in slot 1, so I'll move it there from slot 22.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mojang_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 17}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 29}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 18, "index": 37}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place a paper in slot 2, so I'll move it there from slot 38.
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 17}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 29}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 18, "index": 37}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
